content.text:
The roman numerals are there in case anyone wants to transpose this without a 
capo. And to show what an interesting chord progression it is.

Intro:   [ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]    [ch]F#[/ch] (V)    [ch]E (IV)[/ch]  - 2x   

[ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]        [ch]F#[/ch](V)         [ch]B[/ch] (I)
    through the cracks in the door

[ch]F#[/ch] (V)            [ch]E (IV)[/ch]
   somebody's radio

[ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]   [ch]F#[/ch] (V)          [ch]B[/ch] (I)
    on the third or second floor

[ch]F#[/ch] (V)      [ch]E(IV)[/ch]
   a song I know

[ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]  [ch]F#[/ch](V)       [ch]B[/ch](I)
   break away, break away

[ch]F#[/ch] (V)                         [ch]E (IV)[/ch]
  to where the water meets the ground

[ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]    [ch]F#[/ch] (V)     [ch]B[/ch] (I)
   near the end of the day

[ch]F#[/ch] (V)    [ch]E (IV)[/ch]
  no one around


CHORUS:

[ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]    [ch]F#[/ch] (V)       [ch]E (IV)[/ch]
in my       closed eyes, I can see

         [ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]    [ch]F#[/ch] (V)   [ch]E (IV)[/ch]
miles of sunset, and sunrise, carry me down

[ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]      [ch]F#[/ch] (V)                  [ch]E (IV)[/ch]
   I remember now, there really is no place I'd rather be

          [ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]           [ch]F#[/ch] (V)        [ch]E (IV)[/ch]
when this dream dies, you'll rise and wake me



[ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]       [ch]F#[/ch] (V)     [ch]B[/ch] (I)
   look me     up, look me down

[ch]F#[/ch] (V)                  [ch]E (IV)[/ch]
  make a picture out of me
[ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]     [ch]F#[/ch] (V)      [ch]B[/ch] (I)
     so that anywhere you go

[ch]F#[/ch] (V)       [ch]E (IV)[/ch]
   I’m a memory

[ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]        [ch]F#[/ch] (V)         [ch]E (IV)[/ch]        [ch]B[/ch] (I)
  and don't you worry about the future, it'll get here

[ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]  [ch]F#[/ch] (V)   [ch]E(IV)[/ch]
          it's all right

[ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]       [ch]F#[/ch] (V)        [ch]E(IV)[/ch]             [ch]B[/ch] (I)
     between tomorrow and the dreams of you and yesterday

[ch]G#m (vi)[/ch]    [ch]F#[/ch] (V) [ch]E (IV)[/ch]   [ch]F#[/ch] (V)
          I live tonight

CHORUS


Yes, it ends on a IV chord.

This is my first official tab, so please be easy on me. Just to let you know, I 
mainly play rythm guitar, so this was first for that. I had to listen to this song over and 
over again to try and convert the synths to guitar. I did this the best I could, 
and I think it's pretty accurate. Without any tabs for this song OR New Boyz, this was 
kind of tough.

Capo 2

This song only has 4 chords: C, G, Am, and F. This is the main chord progression: 
C, F, Am, G. This mainly plays throughout the whole song, with the bridge being the only 
exception (F, Am, G, C). Repeat the riff in the beginning when ever you want, for it's optional.

Here is the riff in the beginning:

e|---------------------------------|
b|---1-------1-----1---1-----------|
g|----0--------0-----0-------------|
d|-----2---2-----2-------2---------|
a|-3-----3-------------------------|
E|---------------------------------|

Here we go! Have fun!
